about_the_game:
Enemy Territory: Terrorists Takedown

Dive deep into enemy territory and become a messenger of justice! Enemy Territory Terrorists Takedown offers an immersive FPS experience that puts you in the shoes of a brave soldier assigned to save civilians from cruel terrorists. Set your strategy, act in harmony with your team and strike at the heart of the enemy.

Story

Innocent people who have been oppressed by terrorists for years are waiting to be rescued. Your mission is to end this oppression and bring back hope. As you advance through dangerous areas, you will face challenging enemies, escape insidious traps and ensure the safety of civilians by making smart decisions.

Features

- Immersive Atmosphere: You will find yourself in enemy territory with realistic environmental designs and sound effects.

- Missions: Full of various missions, each requiring different strategies and tactics.

- Rich Weapon: Choose the weapons appropriate for the situation and neutralize your enemies.

- Thrilling Story: Embark on an unforgettable adventure as you fight to change people's destiny.

Join this daring mission and shatter the enemy's darkness. Shine a light on the world with your courage in Enemy Territory Terrorists Takedown!

Are you ready, soldier? The enemy is waiting for you!

name: Enemy Territory Terrorists Takedown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: intel Core i5 3.0 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

short_description: Venture deep into enemy territory and become an ambassador of justice! Enemy Territory Terrorists Takedown is an immersive FPS experience that puts you in the shoes of a brave soldier tasked with saving civilians from brutal terrorists.
